text.section: The secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall promulgate by regulation the form of the bonds required by KRS 45A.180 to 45A.200.

The purchasing agency shall furnish a certified copy of a bond to any person who requests a copy and pays a reasonable fee for the copy. The copy shall be prima facie evidence of the contents, execution, and delivery of the original.

law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 39, effective January 1, 1979.
